author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Book Now and Enjoy Great Deals To Your Favourite Destinations With Turkish AirlinesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Book Now and Enjoy Great Deals To Your Favourite Destinations With Turkish Airlines
Turkish Airlines, Europe best airline – announces the special promotional offers for one way and return fares from Mumbai and New Delhi via Istanbul.
From Mumbai, the offer is valid for selected 30 cities in Europe – Berlin, Warsaw, Helsinki, Frankfurt, Munich, London, Zurich, Geneva, Dusseldorf, Brussels, Moscow, Amsterdam, Manchester, Copenhagen, Vienna, Budapest, Nice, Bologna, Lyon, Paris, Madrid, Birmingham, Dublin, Edinburgh, Milan, Venice, Athens, Stockholm, Rome and Barcelona.
The offer will be valid for ticketing with immediate effect till 30th September, 2015 and travel between 1st October, 2015 till 31 December, 2015 from Mumbai.
The basic fare commence from:
Economy Class – INR 42,300 (round trip, including taxes)*
Business Class –INR 1, 30,800 (round trip, including taxes)*
*Prices may vary depending on availability and city. Terms and conditions apply.
Mehmet Akay, General Manager Western and Southern India, Turkish airlines , said, “We are happy to announce the Promotional Offer for our guests flying out of Mumbai. This is another delightful initiative for our customers. Turkish Airlines is the only airline which flies to more countries than any other airline.”
Further, Turkish Airlines has announced their promotional return fares in Economy class to cities in Americas from Mumbai. The cities include Boston, Chicago, Houston, Los Angeles, Miami, Montreal, New York, San Francisco, Sao Paulo, Toronto and Washington. The offer will be valid for the tickets booked between 9 th September to 30 th September, 2015 and travel till 31 st March 2016. The fare will commence from:
Economy Class – INR 52,000 (round trip, including taxes)*
*Prices may vary depending on availability and city. Terms and conditions apply.
Ozer Guler, General Manager Northern and Eastern India, Turkish airlines, said, “We hope to please our guest with such special offers. Turkish Airlines network spreads across 277 destinations worldwide with 229 international and 48 domestic flights. We will keep announcing such offers for our guests time and again.”
Turkish Airlines is also offering special discounts on the flights from New Delhi to the following cities in Europe and America like Amsterdam, Athens, Barcelona, Bilbao, Madrid, Malaga, Santiago de c, Valencia, Brussels, Budapest, Baden, Berlin, Bremen, Cologne, Dusseldorf, Frankfurt, Friedrichshafen, Hamburg, Hanover, Leipzig, Munich, Nuremberg, Muenster, Stuttgart, Helsinki, Birmingham, London, Manchester, Edinburgh, Bologna, Genoa, Milan, Naples, Rome, Turin, Venice, Pisa, Bari, Nice, Paris, Toulouse, Lyon, Marseille, Prague, Vienna, Zurich, Geneva, Basel, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Houston, Toronto and Boston.
Fares will be valid for ticketing with immediate effect till 30th September, 2015 and travel between 1st October, 2015 till 31st March, 2016 from New Delhi. The offer is applicable for Economy Class.
Source:- Turkish Airlines
